positions.subtitle: AppDynamics
positions.description: Achievements -• Recognised for "Driving the Highest Level of Achievement" for Delivering stretch goals as part of M1 release.• Recognised for "Getting to the Finish Line" for Delivering key feature of alerts in Database Agent.Part of Database Monitoring Team where I-• Designed and implemented Customer Installation Process of Database collector on a kubernetes cluster.• Designed and extended the Operator framework for Db collector resource management on a kubernetes cluster.Responsibilities• Maintaining a mature product (DBMON)• Building the revamped Application from 1st Milestone(DSO) and corresponding Operator Framework.
positions.title: Software Engineer 2 (G6)
positions.description_html:
Achievements -
• Recognised for "Driving the Highest Level of Achievement" for Delivering stretch goals as part of M1 release.

• Building the revamped Application from 1st Milestone(DSO) and corresponding Operator Framework.

experience.title: Software Development Intern
experience.description: • Part of Connected Radar Team in Connected Aerospace.• Converted to Full time via Pre Placement Offer at the end of internship.• Worked on Building Robust APIs using Nodejs to bulk import Radar Data from IoT Hub. • Stress tested the APIs using Jmeter to comply with aero standards.• Deployment using CICD pipelines done on an openshift cluster, Understood the working of the CICD Pipeline flow.
